import React from 'react' import { useState } from "react"; const ShowUserSingleBill = () => { let [formData,setFormData]=useState({ Official_name:'', Echs_card_no:'', Month,Year:'', phone:'', Bank:'', phone:'', }); let handleChange=(e)=>{ let name=e.target.name; let value=e.target.value; console.log(name); setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }) } return ( <>
